thread.title: Creepy Hollow in Rosharon named one of country's best haunted houses
thread.title_full: Creepy Hollow in Rosharon named one of country's best haunted houses - Houston Chronicle

author: chron.com
title: Creepy Hollow in Rosharon named one of country's best haunted houses
text:

Photo: J. Patric Schneider, Freelance Image 11 of 11 Creepy Hollow in Rosharon named one of country's best haunted houses 1 / 11 Back to Gallery Creepy Hollow Haunted House in Rosharon has been named one of the country's top haunted attractions.
Earlier this week, the Haunted Attraction Association released its annual list of "Top Haunted Attractions." The list singled out 17 haunted houses across the country.
"These attractions are setting an industry standard with their commitment to safety and professionalism, while still providing the bone-chilling scares the consumer is seeking," HAA president John Eslich said in a release. "The recognition is a testament to our members that are going the extra mile for the guest experience."
Related Stories Hanging out at Houston's favorite haunts To be certified, the haunted houses had to be in business at least 10 years, have an annual attendance of more than 10,000 and have a specially designed safety program.
Only one other Texas attraction made the list: Dark Hour in Plano.
Located at 12872 Valley Vista in Rosharon, Creepy Hollow boasts three attractions: 288 Scare Factory, Dark Woods and Pitch Black
It is open 7 p.m.-midnight Fridays and Saturdays and 7 p.m.-10 p.m. Thursdays and Sundays through Nov. 14. Tickets are $30.
